name: Broom Battles
description:
Released June 11th, 2016

A magical, witch themed shoot em up!

Broom Battles is a magic centric, 2D shoot em up. Players take control of a witch in flight and can used WASD to fly through the air and shoot magic at their enemies with mouse aiming functionality. Endless waves of monsters spawn, all shooting torrents of bullets at the player. With a high score and kills-for-points system, players need to attempt to live as long as they can to wrack up a big score!

Update: Added level bounds so the player does not die upon exiting the camera view

Leave a comment with feedback and feature requests!

Features:

  • An endless, survival based level
  • WSAD movement and mouse aim shooting functionality
  • Rapid fire poweups and health potions
  • High score system
